definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Heavy Armourer can significantly improve the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 重甲工坊可以为军队提供更为精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: Plate armour is called a "harness", and it requires a Master Armourer to make and fit it to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 板甲又名全身甲，需要盔甲大师为士兵度身定造。

sentences.english: Fett's armor and body were extremely battered by his ordeal in the Sarlacc.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉克中的煎熬使费特的盔甲和身躯都饱受摧残。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。

sentences.english: They ricochet off the armor, leaving drops of glistening venom.
sentences.chinese: 射弹被盔甲反弹回去，盔甲上留下闪闪发光的毒液。

sentences.english: They ricochet off the armor, leaving drops of glistening venom.
sentences.chinese: 射弹被盔甲反弹回去，盔甲上留下闪闪发光的毒液。

sentences.english: There's this guy in a bunch of armor on a horse.
sentences.chinese: 有一个穿着盔甲骑马的人。

sentences.english: Master Armourer substantially improves the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲大师工坊可以为军队提供更为精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: Master Armourer substantially improves the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲大师工坊可以为军队提供更为精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: Fierce Welsh mercenaries, who fight unarmoured, equipped with a spear and capable of forming a defensive ring of spears.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士矛兵盔甲简陋，装备长矛，可列刺猬圆阵。

sentences.english: Xu Ning returned home and heard that his metal-bound goose feather armor had been stolen.
sentences.chinese: 许尼嗯回家，听说他的金属盔甲约束鹅毛被人偷走了。

sentences.english: Can a character who takes this feat stack the armor bonus from bracers of armor with Inertial Armor?
sentences.chinese: 人物可以将防御护腕的盔甲加值和该专长累计么？

sentences.english: Strung on a coat of mail, they sparkle in a dramatic gradation of winter tones.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲似的设想，闪现出注目诱人的冬日幻变色彩。

sentences.english: SK:Ah, a common problem with the heavier armors.
sentences.chinese: 啊，重型盔甲的普遍问题。

sentences.english: Maybe his recent saltwater dunking and ice encrustation had caused a problem in the MJOLNIR system.
sentences.chinese: 或许是近期的盐水浸泡和冰冻使雷神锤盔甲出了问题。

sentences.english: Like to the armour's iron brace.

definition: to put on a suit of armor/to put on dress/to wear
